Navigator Skills.Effect: Displays detailed enemy information (stats, resistances, and skills).
Displays all buffs and debuffs currently in effect.
Increases information displayed on the target (shows whether an attack will be nulled, repelled, or absorbed).
Party recovers 15% HP when ascending to the next floor.

Causes one of the following effects in P3/FES: 1. HP restored. 2. SP restored. 3. HP and SP restored. 4. All status ailments cured. 5. HP reduced to 1. Causes one of the following effects in Portable: - Party's average HP is >=50%: 1. Mind Charge AND Power Charge. 2. All -Kaja on the Party. 3. Revolution. - Party's average HP is <50%: 1. HP Restored. (Guaranteed if there are 2 or less party members alive, random if there are 3) 2. Makarakarn AND Tetrakarn on the party. (Guaranteed if there are 4 party members alive, random if there are 3)
Return to the entrance of Tartarus or the Desert of Doors.
